full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA SPYAN RAS GZIGS KYI BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,SMRAS PA, GZUNGS SNGAGS YIG DRUG PHAN YON LA, ,YID CHES DAD PAS BZLAS PA NI, ,SDIG SGRIB TSANG TSANG KUN SREG ME, ,NGAN SONG TSA GDUNG GZHIL @011B BA'I CHU, ,RIGS DRUG 'KHOR BA'I SGO BCAD DE, ,BDE LDAN ZHING GI SGO 'BYED YIN, ,DER NI SNANG MTHA' MGON PO LAS, ,CHOS NYAN TSOGS RDZOGS MYUR LAM YIN, ,KYE MA THABS TSUL 'DIR PHRAD PA, ,RMI LAM MIN NA RUNG SNYAM STE, ,GZUNGS MCHOG YI GE DRUG PA LA, ,NYIN MTSAN 'BAD PAS 'JUG PAR RIGS, ,ZHES PA 'DI DAG SH'A SA NA'I MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
